CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: （~ to）应该；应当（表示义务、责任、合适、必要）；该（表示可能性、期望）；应该（表示愿望）；有义务；有责任；理应；预料会做；（~ to have done）早应该；本该；本当

word_group.brief_definition: 淫乱的；乱交的；道德品质有问题的
应该有；应当有；应该拥有

bilingual.source: You ought to look after your health more.
bilingual.target: 你应该多注意你的健康。

bilingual.source: I ought to train more to improve my skill.
bilingual.target: 我应该多训练来提高技巧。

bilingual.source: We ought to find the perfect person for our bet.
bilingual.target: 我们应该找到最适合打赌的人。

bilingual.source: Would you tell me, please, which way I ought to go from here?
bilingual.target: 请告诉我，我应该从这里往哪走？

bilingual.source: We figured that in twenty years each of us ought to have our destiny worked out.
bilingual.target: 我们认为二十年后我们每个人的命运都应该已经确定。

bilingual.source: He ought to apologize for his mistake.
bilingual.target: 他应该为他的错误道歉。

bilingual.source: She ought to be more careful with her words.
bilingual.target: 她应该对她的话更小心。

bilingual.source: You ought to see a doctor if you feel unwell.
bilingual.target: 如果你感觉不舒服，你应该去看医生。

bilingual.source: They ought to respect other people's opinions.
bilingual.target: 他们应该尊重他人的意见。

bilingual.source: We ought to finish this project by the end of the week.
bilingual.target: 我们应该在本周末前完成这个项目。

list.abstract: ought（ [ˈɔːt]），英语单词，作动词为应当。作名词为零。作代词为任何事物。短语搭配有ought to（应当，应该）。例句为“The overall facts ought to reassure us.（总的事实应该让我们放心。）” ought助动词类近义词有should、must等。

yingyinNormal.en: This ought to be good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但愿是好主意。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps you ought to go. It might wake up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们快走吧，它可随时会醒过来。

yingyinNormal.en: That ought to do it. Hi. It's me. Oh, good!
yingyinNormal.zh: 事情好办了。我回来了。正好！

yingyinNormal.en: The stable clock's fast. We ought to get back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 马厩的钟快了，我们得走了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, you ought, stupid girl. Unroll the Oraculum.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，你知道，傻女孩，打开那个预言卷轴。

yingyinNormal.en: A retard? Well, shoot, that ought to tell you something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 智障？你也该看出来一些事吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Why do I still remember everything? I ought to have been wiped.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么我什么都记得？我的记忆应该被清除了才对。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, let's not talk about it now. We ought to join the others.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是现在先不谈这个，我们也去用餐吧。

yingyinNormal.en: We shall see. What do you mean by that? I ought to know who I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我们来瞧瞧。你什么意思？我当然知道我自己是谁。

yingyinNormal.en: You ought to be careful. People will think you're up to something.
yingyinNormal.zh: 得小心点，人们会以为你们在干坏事。

yingyinNormal.en: We ought to look at the costs. It's good of you to come with me today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们该看一下成本，今天你能陪我来真好。

yingyinNormal.en: There, that ought to do it. There, I'll give you some change for the bus fare.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，应该可以了，过来，我给你点零钱搭公交。

yingyinNormal.en: I ought to do some shopping while I'm here. I haven't had anything new in ages.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正好来了，我也该买点衣服，我好久没买新衣服了。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know if that was meaningful or senile, but I thought it ought to be said.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道这话是否有意义，还是我老糊涂了，但我觉得应该告诉你。

yingyinNormal.en: Ooh, is this one of those paintball guns? Yeah. You ought to come out with us sometime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是你们的彩弹枪？没错，你下次应该和我们一起来。

yingyinNormal.en: Why ask the question when the decision has been made? Come on, we ought to join the others.
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然已经做出了决定，何必多问？走吧，去找其他人。

yingyinNormal.en: Please lie down. I've got a salve that ought to shrink that right up. I guess it's worth a try.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请趴下，我有一种药膏可以让它缩小，值得一试。

yingyinNormal.en: Looking round the table, I wonder if we ought to have opened Grantham House. I feel rather guilty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看这一桌，我在想我们是不是该开放格兰瑟姆大宅，我觉得有点愧疚。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, you listen to me, all three of you. You're meddling in things that ought not to be meddled in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们都听着，给我听好，你们在管那些不应该管的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Is there anything you can tell us about the Tesseract that we ought to know now? You should have left it in the ocean.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对于找回魔方你有什么具体的建议吗？你们应该把它留在海里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers admit that their study does not answer the question of how much businesses <highlight>ought</highlight> to spend on CSR.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员承认，他们的研究并没有回答企业应该在企业社会责任上花多少钱的问题。

examination_example.sentence: Charles <highlight>ought</highlight> to know that as English history shows, it is kings, not republicans, who are the monarchy's worst enemies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 查理应该知道，英国历史表明，君主政体最大的敌人是国王，而不是共和军。

examination_example.sentence: Global challenges and social innovation <highlight>ought</highlight> to receive much more attention from scientists, especially the young ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全球挑战和社会创新应该得到科学家，尤其是年轻科学家更多的关注。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The culture of Silicon Valley <highlight>ought</highlight> not to be emulated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 硅谷的文化不应该被模仿。

examination_example.sentence: What job applicants <highlight>ought</highlight> to be looking for is what the company is up to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 求职者应该寻找的是公司在做什么。

examination_example.sentence: The overall facts <highlight>ought</highlight> to reassure us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总的事实应该让我们放心。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It may make people feel that they <highlight>ought</highlight> to fit in with the outside world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可能会让人们觉得他们应该适应外面的世界。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: You really <highlight>ought</highlight> to take a boat down the Amazon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你真的应该乘船顺亚马逊河而下。

examination_example.sentence: Parents <highlight>ought</highlight> to be able to opt out only for limited medical or religious reasons.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母只有在有限的医疗或宗教原因下才可以选择退出。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>ought</highlight> to develop their own independence and just be themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们应该发展自己的独立性，做自己。

examination_example.sentence: You <highlight>ought</highlight> to change it even if it seems to be working.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该改变它，即使它看起来是有效的。

examination_example.sentence: You <highlight>ought</highlight> to have two plans for getting out of your house if there is a fire.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果发生火灾，你应该有两个逃出房子的计划。
